Fordon Greeman Approves.

This game was a revolutionary first person shooter for its time and has aged well enough over the [i]11 years[/i] it has been around. Just make sure the difficulty is not set to easy, because easy difficulty is easy.

The father of the modern shooter, easy might be, well, too easy at first but around the end becomes much harder as you learn to use everything at your disposal, so easy is good for newbies to the genre of FPS. If you're not new, definetly play medium or hard, it'll be a satisfying experience with visuals that still look good to this day and a pretty cool story with the most badass protagonist to ever live. Only problem, friendly AI is a bit annoying but the enemy AI is smart and deadly (at least specially for combines, zombies just try to claw you or throw stuff at you, and antlions just charge, but they become SPOILER ALERT SPOILER ALERT SPOILER ALERT allies later on).

Get the orange box, you won't regret it.

This game is so good, the thought of a sequal has every one of its fans ready to drop their life savings for it. Definately my favorite game without question. A beauiful story that will twist your mind as you transition from escape, horror, survival, and swarm game styles that make this game outshine all of its competitors. If you havn't given this game a chance, this one needs to be the first one on both your wishlist and bucket list

This is one of the greatest first person shooters ive ever played. I cant believe it took me 11 years after its release to finally play it. This game is way ahead of its time. some of the things u can do in this game are still not in most fps games. The gravity gun is amazing.. And the puzzles in the game are really good. everything about this game is awesome. The game was a bit challenging compared to games like call of duty and the campaign was about 15 hours long.

There is no reason why one of the highest ratest games of all time isn't in your library. Drop whatever you have to do to play this game. This game is what put Valve on the map by using physics succesfully to improve a game's gameplay.

10/10
√ìtimo jogo! Vale a pena jogar toda a campanha!

Best game series ever. Made Valve what it is and will forever hold a point in history as the World's first game to get a 11/10 from a major gaming magazine (read the wiki). No game will ever get that type of score from a major magazine ever again.

As for my low playtime, played it a lot on a different account in which something happened.

An amazing sequel to an amazing game. This game was the blueprint for every FPS game released since 2004. The utilization of the Source engine allows for many new feature such as the physics puzzles. Maybe one day of Half-Life 3 will be released. Maybe not. However this game is amazing and definitely worth a buy. Especially since it is only $10 and even cheaper when it goes on a sale. It is a must have for every PC gamer.
Good Game it Was Worth it payig 5 bucks for the orange box in Steam summer sale

I first played this game on Xbox many years ago.  I have since purchased it on Steam and have enjoyed countless hours of gaming, especialy with all expansion episodes available.  Truly a gaming masterpiece of epic proportions.  You will love it!

Do you really need a review to play this? Well, if you insist...

* Pros:

1. Awesome and deep storyline (so deep you kinda see Adelle rolling in it).
2. Simple, yet great gameplay mechanics.
3. Interesting characters.
4. Great graphics for it's time.
5. Tons of modding support keep the game alive.
6. Awesome modding community.
7. DLC is just as good, if not better.

* Cons:

1. It's not Half-Life 3.
2. Barney is not an animal person.
10/10 Game Would Play Again

There's a reason Half-Life 3 has become such a wanted game. Half-Life 2 is [b]very[/b] good FPS, with graphics that still hold up today, a thrilling story, great soundtrack and fantastic gameplay. It really is a very memorable experience, and a modern-day classic.

Even tought was made 10years ago the game has pretty good graphics and a really nice history and sequence that cativates the most part of the players which try it.

This game is FPS at its best! No matter how many times you play it, you'll either crap your pants or have your mind explode out of the sheer awesomeness of this game!! Incredible puzzles, Frightful and disgusting enemies, superb dialogue, and best of all a gun like no other that allows you to turn every day items to super destructive items of terror!!! I don't care if you're the world's greatest gamer, if you haven't played this game...you haven't lived yet.
